attributes.action: provide sufficient resources to make sure that the CAA team at Longbenton are able to process forms 64-8 within 3 weeks of receipt.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The CAA team at Longbenton are responsible for dealing with form 64-8 which is authorisation by a client to HMRC to deal with an agent. The team are very behind with their work and this is clogging up the systems and is creating bad relationships between agents and HMRC as clients believe it is the agent who is inefficient.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
